# Accessory.Chirality

**Enumeration**

The hand which an accessory corresponds to.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Chirality
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Accessory.Chirality.left**: Left-handed accessory, or non-handed accessory held in left hand.
- **Accessory.Chirality.right**: Right-handed accessory, or non-handed accessory held in right hand.
- **Accessory.Chirality.unspecified**: Unspecified (non-handed accessory, not associated with a hand).

## Instance Properties

- **description**: A textual representation of Chirality

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: Left-handed accessory, or non-handed accessory held in left hand.
